title: Trump Hospitalized, DNC Chair Perez, Jobs
itunes:title: Trump Hospitalized, DNC Chair Perez, Jobs
description:
Guests: DNC Chairman Tom Perez, John Fortier, executive director of the Continuity of Government Commission at Bipartisan Policy Center, Kriti Gupta, Bloomberg Markets Live reporter, Rick Davis, Partner at Stone Court Capital, former campaign manager for John McCain's 2008 presidential campaign, Josh Green, Bloomberg Businessweek Political Reporter, Mattie Duppler, Founder of Forward Strategies, and Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union, and Jeanne Zaino, Iona College professor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
